title: Definition of Range
text: The range is all the possible outputs of the function.

title: Maximum and Minimum
text: Since the parabola open upwards with a positive coefficient for the $$x^2$$ value, the range is greater or equal to the y-value associated with the vertex.

title: Finding the Vertex
text: The vertex can be easily identified as (h,k) when the equation is in standard vertex form of $$f(x)={a\left(h-k\right)}^2+k$$.

title: Y-value of Vertex
text: What is the y-coordinate of the vertex?
